TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ZipArchiveEntry extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 zip 档案中的压缩文件。

span.span: Represents a compressed file within a zip archive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Zip 存档包含每个压缩文件的一项。A zip archive contains an entry for each compressed file. 类使你可以检查某项的属性和打开或删除的项。The class enables you to examine the properties of an entry, and open or delete the entry. 当您打开一个条目时，可以通过写入到该压缩文件的流来修改压缩的文件。When you open an entry, you can modify the compressed file by writing to the stream for that compressed file. 用于操作的 zip 存档和其文件条目的方法将分布在三个类： ，和。The methods for manipulating zip archives and their file entries are spread across three classes: , and . |自...To…|使用...Use…| |---------|----------| |从目录中创建的 zip 存档Create a zip archive from a directory|| |解压缩 zip 存档到目录的内容Extract the contents of a zip archive to a directory|| |将新文件添加到现有的 zip 存档Add new files to an existing zip archive|| |检索 zip 存档中的文件Retrieve an file in a zip archive|| |检索所有 zip 存档中的文件Retrieve all of the files in a zip archive|| |若要将流打开到单个文件包含在 zip 存档文件To open a stream to an individual file contained in a zip archive|| |从 zip 存档中删除文件Delete a file from a zip archive|| 如果引用`System.IO.Compression.FileSystem`在项目中的程序集，可以访问两个扩展方法类。If you reference the `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly in your project, you can access two extension methods for the class. 这些方法都和，并且它们使你可以解压缩到文件项的内容。Those methods are and , and they enable you to decompress the contents of the entry to a file. `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem`程序集不在可用[!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)]。The `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly is not available in [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)]. 中[!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]应用程序，可以通过使用解压缩存档的内容或，或者可以使用[!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)]类型[压缩程序](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=246357)并[解压缩程序](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=246358)到压缩和解压缩文件。In [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps, you can decompress the contents of an archive by using or , or you can use the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] types [Compressor](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=246357) and [Decompressor](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=246358) to compress and decompress files. ## Examples 第一个示例演示如何在 zip 存档中创建新的条目，并向其中写入。The first example shows how to create a new entry in a zip archive and write to it. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchivemode/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchivemode/vb/program1.vb#1)] 第二个示例演示如何使用扩展方法。The second example shows how to use the extension method. 必须引用`System.IO.Compression.FileSystem`代码项目中的要执行程序集。You must reference the `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly in your project for the code to execute. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program1.vb#1)]

span.span: The compressed size of the entry in the zip archive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无法检索此属性，当模式设置为，或将模式设置为和打开条目。This property cannot be retrieved when the mode is set to , or the mode is set to and the entry has been opened. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何检索 zip 存档中的条目和评估条目的属性。The following example shows how to retrieve entries in a zip archive, and evaluate the properties of the entries. 它使用属性显示的项的名称和和属性计算多少文件被压缩。It uses the property to display the name of the entry, and the and properties to calculate how much the file was compressed. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchiveentry/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchiveentry/vb/program1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 由于项已修改，属性的值不可用。

span.span: The value of the property is not available because the entry has been modified.

exception.span: 已打开用于读取或写入的项。

span.span: The entry is already open for reading or writing.

exception.span: 除 之外，此项的 zip 存档已通过一种模式中打开。

span.span: The zip archive for this entry was opened in a mode other than .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ExternalAttributes { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.ExternalAttributes : int with get, set

summary.span: 操作系统和应用程序特定的文件属性。

span.span: OS and application specific file attributes.

value.span: 编写此输入时由应用程序编写的外部属性。

span.span: The external attributes written by the application when this entry was written.

value.span: 这同时依赖于主机操作系统和应用程序。

span.span: It is both host OS and application dependent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 外部的属性的映射是主机系统相关。The mapping of the external attributes is host-system dependent. 对于 MS-DOS，低序位字节是 MS-DOS 目录属性字节。For MS-DOS, the low order byte is the MS-DOS directory attribute byte. Unix，高高位字节是经常用于存储的文件权限。For Unix, the high Order byte is frequently used to store the file permissions. 如果输入来自标准输入，此字段设置为零。If input came from standard input, this field is set to zero.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property FullName As String
public: property System::String ^ FullName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 zip 存档中的项的相对路径。

span.span: Gets the relative path of the entry in the zip archive.

value.span: 在 zip 存档中的项的相对路径。

span.span: The relative path of the entry in the zip archive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含相对路径，包括子目录的层次结构，zip 存档中的条目。The property contains the relative path, including the subdirectory hierarchy, of an entry in a zip archive. (与此相反，属性包含仅项的名称，不包括子目录层次结构。)例如，如果通过使用 zip 存档中创建两个条目方法，并提供`NewEntry.txt`作为第一个条目的名称和`AddedFolder\\NewEntry.txt`对于第二个条目，这两个条目都`NewEntry.txt`中属性。(In contrast, the property contains only the name of the entry and does not include the subdirectory hierarchy.) For example, if you create two entries in a zip archive by using the method and provide `NewEntry.txt` as the name for the first entry and `AddedFolder\\NewEntry.txt` for the second entry, both entries will have `NewEntry.txt` in the property. 第一个条目将还具有`NewEntry.txt`中属性，但第二个条目会`AddedFolder\\NewEntry.txt`中属性。The first entry will also have `NewEntry.txt` in the property, but the second entry will have `AddedFolder\\NewEntry.txt` in the property. 您可以指定任何字符串作为一个项，包括指定无效和绝对路径的字符串的路径。You can specify any string as the path of an entry, including strings that specify invalid and absolute paths. 因此，属性可能包含格式不正确的值。Therefore, the property might contain a value that is not correctly formatted. 提取 zip 存档的内容时，无效或绝对路径可能会导致异常。An invalid or absolute path might result in an exception when you extract the contents of the zip archive. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何循环访问内容的.zip 文件中，并提取包含.txt 扩展名的文件。The following example shows how to iterate through the contents of a .zip file, and extract files that contain the .txt extension. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property DateTimeOffset LastWriteTime { DateTimeOffset get(); void set(DateTimeOffset value); };
member this.LastWriteTime : DateTimeOffset with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置最近一次更改 zip 存档中的项的时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the last time the entry in the zip archive was changed.

value.span: 最近一次更改 zip 存档中的项的时间。

span.span: The last time the entry in the zip archive was changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建新项时从现有的文件通过调用方法，修改属性的条目将自动设置为上一次文件。When you create a new entry from an existing file by calling the method, the property for the entry is automatically set to the last time the file was modified. 创建新项时以编程方式通过调用方法，项的属性自动设置为执行的时间。When you create a new entry programmatically by calling the method, the property for the entry is automatically set to the time of execution. 如果您修改该条目，您必须显式设置属性，如果希望此值以反映最新更改的时间。If you modify the entry, you must explicitly set the property if you want the value to reflect the time of the latest change. 当设置此属性，值转换为特定于 zip 存档的时间戳格式。When you set this property, the value is converted to a timestamp format that is specific to zip archives. 此格式支持的分辨率为两秒。This format supports a resolution of two seconds. 最早的允许的值为 1980 年 1 月 1 0:00:00 （午夜）。The earliest permitted value is 1980 January 1 0:00:00 (midnight). 允许的最新值是 2107年 12 月 31 日 23:59:58 （之前午夜的一秒）。The latest permitted value is 2107 December 31 23:59:58 (one second before midnight). 如果上次编写时间的值不是有效的该属性返回的默认值为 1980年 1 月 1 日 0:00:00 （午夜）。If the value for the last write time is not valid, the property returns a default value of 1980 January 1 0:00:00 (midnight). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何打开 zip 存档中的条目、 修改它，并设置属性设置为当前时间。The following example shows how to open an entry in a zip archive, modify it, and set the property to the current time. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchiveentry/cs/program2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchiveentry/vb/program2.vb#2)]

exception.span: 尝试设置此属性失败，因为该项的 zip 存档处于 模式。

span.span: The attempt to set this property failed, because the zip archive for the entry is in mode.
The archive mode is set to .
\- or -

exception.span: 存档模式已设置为 ，并且已打开该项。

span.span: The archive mode is set to and the entry has been opened.

exception.span: 已尝试将此属性的值设置为早于 1980 年 1 月 1 日 0:00:00（午夜）或晚于 2107 年 12 月 31 日 23:59:58 (午夜的前一秒钟)。

span.span: An attempt was made to set this property to a value that is either earlier than 1980 January 1 0:00:00 (midnight) or later than 2107 December 31 23:59:58 (one second before midnight).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取在 zip 存档中的项的文件名。

span.span: Gets the file name of the entry in the zip archive.

value.span: 在 zip 存档中的项的文件名。

span.span: The file name of the entry in the zip archive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含的部分最后一个目录分隔符字符后面的属性 (\\)，并且不包括子目录层次结构。The property contains the portion of the property that follows the final directory separator character (\\), and does not include the subdirectory hierarchy. 例如，如果通过使用 zip 存档中创建两个条目方法，并提供`NewEntry.txt`作为第一个条目的名称和`AddedFolder\\NewEntry.txt`对于第二个条目，这两个条目都`NewEntry.txt`中属性。For example, if you create two entries in a zip archive by using the method and provide `NewEntry.txt` as the name for the first entry and `AddedFolder\\NewEntry.txt` for the second entry, both entries will have `NewEntry.txt` in the property. 第一个条目将还具有`NewEntry.txt`中属性，但第二个条目会`AddedFolder\\NewEntry.txt`中属性。The first entry will also have `NewEntry.txt` in the property, but the second entry will have `AddedFolder\\NewEntry.txt` in the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何从 zip 存档中检索项并评估条目的属性。The following example shows how to retrieve entries from a zip archive and evaluate the properties of the entries. 它使用属性显示的项的名称和和属性计算多少文件被压缩。It uses the property to display the name of the entry, and the and properties to calculate how much the file was compressed. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchiveentry/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchiveentry/vb/program1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.IO.Stream Open() cil managed

summary.span: 打开 zip 存档中的项。

span.span: Opens the entry from the zip archive.
The stream that represents the contents of the entry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于访问 zip 存档中的条目的流。You use this method to access the stream for an entry in a zip archive. 检索流之后, 可以读取或写入到流。After retrieving the stream, you can read from or write to the stream. 时写入到流时，将 zip 存档中显示的项进行的修改。When you write to the stream, the modifications you make to the entry will appear in the zip archive. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建新的条目，将其与打开方法，并写入到流。The following example shows how to create a new entry, open it with the method, and write to the stream. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchivemode/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchivemode/vb/program1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 当前已打开用于写入的项。

span.span: The entry is already currently open for writing.
-or-

span.span: The entry has been deleted from the archive.
-or-

span.span: The archive for this entry was opened with the mode, and this entry has already been written to.

exception.span: 存档中缺少该条目，或者该条目已损坏且无法读取。

span.span: The entry is either missing from the archive or is corrupt and cannot be read.
-or-

exception.span: 已经通过使用一种不受支持的压缩方法压缩该条目。

span.span: The entry has been compressed by using a compression method that is not supported.

exception.span: 已释放此项的 zip 存档。

span.span: The zip archive for this entry has been disposed.
